official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to permit the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to insure deposits in branch offices of insured banks operating in the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to permit the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to insure deposits in branch offices of insured banks operating in the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
